text.div:
Swissnoso_IG

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://fhir.ch/ig/swissnoso/ImplementationGuide/ch.fhir.ig.swissnoso

Implementation guide to specify the exchange format for data transmission to Swissnoso in the context of monitoring and prevention of healthcare-associated infections.

name: Swissnoso_IG
title: Swissnoso Implementation Guide (R4)
description: Implementation guide to specify the exchange format for data transmission to Swissnoso in the context of monitoring and prevention of healthcare-associated infections.

resource.name: Swissnoso Encounter
resource.description: This profile constrains the Encounter resource to represent the characteristics of an encounter in the context of a report to Swissnoso.

resource.name: Swissnoso Location
resource.description: This profile constrains the Location resource to represent the characteristics of a location in the context of a report to Swissnoso.

resource.name: Swissnoso Message CAUTI Surveillance
resource.description: This profile constrains the Bundle resource to represent the message in the context of the CAUTI Surveillance module.

resource.name: Swissnoso MessageHeader CAUTI Surveillance
resource.description: This profile constrains the MessageHeader resource to represent the first entry in the message in the context of the CAUTI Surveillance module.

resource.name: Swissnoso Observation
resource.description: This profile constrains the Observation resource to represent the characteristics of a observation in the context of a report to Swissnoso.

resource.name: Swissnoso Observation Angle Pain or Tenderness
resource.description: This profile constrains the Observation resource to represent the presence/absence of the symptom costovertebral angle pain or tenderness in the context of the CAUTI Surveillance module.

resource.name: Swissnoso Observation Dysuria
resource.description: This profile constrains the Observation resource to represent the presence/absence of the symptom dysuria in the context of the CAUTI Surveillance module.

resource.name: Swissnoso Observation Fever
resource.description: This profile constrains the Observation resource to represent the presence/absence of the symptom fever in the context of the CAUTI Surveillance module.

resource.name: Swissnoso Observation Germ
resource.description: This profile constrains the Observation resource to represent the germ in the context of the CAUTI Surveillance module.

resource.name: Swissnoso Observation Number of Different Germs
resource.description: This profile constrains the Observation resource to represent the number of different swissnoso-germs in the context of the CAUTI Surveillance module.

resource.name: Swissnoso Observation Suprapubic Tenderness
resource.description: This profile constrains the Observation resource to represent the presence/absence of the symptom suprapubic tenderness in the context of the CAUTI Surveillance module.

resource.name: Swissnoso Observation Symptoms
resource.description: This profile constrains the Observation resource to represent the presence/absence of symptoms in the context of the CAUTI Surveillance module.

resource.name: Swissnoso Observation Urinary Frequency
resource.description: This profile constrains the Observation resource to represent the presence/absence of the symptom urinary frequency in the context of the CAUTI Surveillance module.

resource.name: Swissnoso Observation Urinary Urgency
resource.description: This profile constrains the Observation resource to represent the presence/absence of the symptom urinary urgency in the context of the CAUTI Surveillance module.

resource.name: Swissnoso Organization
resource.description: This profile constrains the Organization resource to represent the characteristics of an organization in the context of a report to Swissnoso.

resource.name: Swissnoso Patient
resource.description: This profile constrains the Patient resource to represent the characteristics of a patient in the context of a report to Swissnoso.

resource.name: Swissnoso Procedure
resource.description: This profile constrains the Procedure resource to represent the characteristics of a procedure in the context of a report to Swissnoso.

resource.name: Swissnoso Procedure Insert Catheter
resource.description: This profile constrains the Procedure resource to represent the procedure of inserting a catheter in the context of the CAUTI Surveillance module.

resource.name: Swissnoso Procedure Microbiology
resource.description: This profile constrains the Procedure resource to represent the microbiology in the context of the CAUTI Surveillance module.

resource.name: Swissnoso Procedure Remove Catheter
resource.description: This profile constrains the Procedure resource to represent the procedure of removing a catheter in the context of the CAUTI Surveillance module.

resource.name: Swissnoso Admission Date Monitored Unit
resource.description: Extension defined by Swissnoso to describe the date of admission to the monitored organizational unit.

resource.name: Swissnoso Discharge Date Monitored Unit
resource.description: Extension defined by Swissnoso to describe the date of discharge from the monitored organizational unit.

resource.name: Swissnoso Organizational Unit
resource.description: Extension defined by Swissnoso to describe the organizational unit with its specialty.

resource.name: Swissnoso Sequence Number
resource.description: Extension defined by Swissnoso to be able to indicate the sequence number.

resource.name: Swissnoso Transurethral Procedure
resource.description: Extension defined by Swissnoso to describe whether the procedure was performed as part of a transurethral procedure.

resource.name: Swissnoso Bacterial Count in Urine
resource.description: This value set includes the codes defined in the code system 'Swissnoso Bacterial Count in Urine'.

resource.name: Swissnoso Clinical Symptom
resource.description: This value set includes the codes defined in the code system 'Swissnoso Clinical Symptom'.

resource.name: Swissnoso Germ
resource.description: This value set includes the SNOMED CT codes for representing the germ.

resource.name: Swissnoso Indication
resource.description: This value set includes the codes defined in the code system 'Swissnoso Indication'.

resource.name: Swissnoso Number of Different Germs
resource.description: This value set includes the codes defined in the code system 'Swissnoso Number of Different Germs'.

resource.name: Swissnoso Organizational Unit
resource.description: This value set includes the ECDC 'Ward specialty' codes for representing the organization unit.

resource.name: Swissnoso Procedure Location
resource.description: This value set includes the codes defined in the code system 'Swissnoso Procedure Location'.

resource.name: Swissnoso Specialty
resource.description: This value set includes the ECDC 'Patient/consultant specialty' codes for representing the specialty.

resource.name: ECDC Patient-Consultant Specialty
resource.description:
This code system contains specialty codes defined by the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC), 
used by Swissnoso in the context of monitoring and prevention of healthcare-associated infections. 
See original code system in [European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control. Point prevalence survey of healthcare-associated infections and antimicrobial 
use in European acute care hospitals – protocol version 5.3. Stockholm: ECDC; 2016.](https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/sites/default/files/media/en/publications/Publications/PPS-HAI-antimicrobial-use-EU-acute-care-hospitals-V5-3.pdf), page 40 f.

resource.name: ECDC Ward Specialty
resource.description:
This code system contains specialty codes defined by the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC), 
used by Swissnoso in the context of monitoring and prevention of healthcare-associated infections. 
See original code system in [European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control. Point prevalence survey of healthcare-associated infections and antimicrobial 
use in European acute care hospitals – protocol version 5.3. Stockholm: ECDC; 2016.](https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/sites/default/files/media/en/publications/Publications/PPS-HAI-antimicrobial-use-EU-acute-care-hospitals-V5-3.pdf), page 40 f.

resource.name: Swissnoso
resource.description:
This code system contains codes defined by Swissnoso 
for which no international codes (e.g. LOINC or SNOMED CT) could be found that accurately describe 
the meaning for the Swissnoso context.

resource.name: Swissnoso Bacterial Count in Urine
resource.description:
This code system contains codes defined by Swissnoso for representing the bacterial count in urine.
The value ranges for this are based on the CAUTI definition of the National Healthcare Safety Network (NHSN), 
see the corresponding [NHSN manual](https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/pdfs/pscmanual/7psccauticurrent.pdf).

resource.name: Swissnoso Clinical Symptom
resource.description:
This code system contains codes defined by Swissnoso for representing the clinical symptom. 
The selection of the clinical symptoms are based on the CAUTI definition of the National Healthcare Safety Network (NHSN), 
see the corresponding [NHSN manual](https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/pdfs/pscmanual/7psccauticurrent.pdf).

resource.name: Swissnoso Indication
resource.description: This code system contains codes defined by Swissnoso for representing the indication.

resource.name: Swissnoso Number of Different Germs
resource.description:
This code system contains codes defined by Swissnoso for representing the number of different germs. 
The division of the numbers are based on the CAUTI definition of the National Healthcare Safety Network (NHSN), 
see the corresponding [NHSN manual](https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/pdfs/pscmanual/7psccauticurrent.pdf).

resource.name: Swissnoso Procedure Location
resource.description: This code system contains codes defined by Swissnoso for representing the location where the procedure is performed.

resource.name: MessageHeader UC 102938
resource.description: Example of a Swissnoso message header (UC 102938)

resource.name: MessageHeader UC 14200
resource.description: Example of a Swissnoso message header (UC 14200)

resource.name: MessageHeader UC 181521
resource.description: Example of a Swissnoso message header (UC 181521)

resource.name: MessageHeader UC 44371
resource.description: Example of a Swissnoso message header (UC 44371)

resource.name: SwissnosoOrganizationalUnit-to-SwissnosoSpecialty
resource.description: Mapping to describe the relationships between organization units and specialty.
